item.title: Report X-2025020607
item.description:
Report X-2025020607

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-07
  • City: DAVENPORT
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE SPILL WEARING ALL PROPPER PPE AND USING DESICON TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. RESPONDER CONTAINED THE SPILL USING THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART AND OXIDISER RESPONE SHEET AND PROCESSED THE SPILL THROUGH THE DMP.
